Name: Statuette of Osiris
Description: Osiris is represented standing on a rectangular base with a tenon. His body is enveloped in a tightly fitting mummy gown leaving exposed only his hands holding a crook and a flail; he wears a heavy tripartite wig with uraeus, an atef-crown with ram's horns, and a pleated artificial beard. There are slight unreadable races of an inscription on the front surface of the base.
